questions_and_notes: To avoid misleading dependence on the fractional area of sea ice, specify "where sea_ice".  For consistency with description, specify "where sea_ice over all_area_types".
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Evaporation and Sublimation
comment: The rate of change of sea-ice mass change through evaporation and sublimation divided by grid-cell area
